sense.def:
Izraz na obrazu ali gib, ki je
pleading
, pokaže, da si nekaj močno želimo.

seg.quote: Then he saw his brother's pleading expression and his heart softened.

sense.def:
Pleading
je zelo čustveno izražanje prošnje, naj nekdo nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: After days of tearful pleading and sulking, she stayed.
It was hard to resist his daughter's pleadings.
